content: chunky spiral hat knit in the round 2026-01-10 by margaretgi supplies circular needles u s size 13 tapestry needles scissors etc super bulky yarn 4 ounces approx 75 yards lion wool ease thick & quick pumpkin was used for the hat shown guage 10 stitches x 8 row in k1 p1 rib = 4 wide by 2 5 tall caston cast on 40 stitches using a loose cast on example hat used german twisted cast-on a k a old norwegian cast-on join in the round and put a stitch marker at the beginning of the row brim k1 p1 rib each row for 2 5 inches 8 row in example hat chunky spiral hat knit in the round cont d 2026-01-10 by margaretgi hat body row 1 k1 m1 k1 this is the first knit 3 and means the row is now 41 stitches p3 row 1 continued k3 p3 repeat continue with k3 p3 continuously until the hat is 7 long or desired length because of the extra stitch added the pattern will shift 1 stitch to the left each round and that is what creates the rib spiral graphic graphic example k for knit p for purl this pattern is a multiple of 6 1 6 * 7 = 42 -1 = 41 stitches row 4 kkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkppp row 3 kkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpp row 2 pkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkp row 1 ppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkkpppkkk crown decrease the decrease section is done in purl to match the raised texture of the spirals row 1 p1 p2 together * p2 p2 together repeat from * to last 2 stitches p2 together 30 stitches remain row 2 purl the row row 3 * p1 p2 together repeat from * to end of row 20 stitches remain row 4 purl the row row 5 p2 together all the way around 10 stitches remain leave a 2 foot tail and cut off the yarn from the skein thread tail in a darning needle draw the tail through the remaining 10 stitches as they are slid off the needle tighten the thread and draw through the stitches again pass the thread to the inside of the hat and knot it off thread the tail into stitches on the inside of the hat and trim of the leftover tail finish the cast-on tail into the inside of the hat and trim example hat is 8 wide at the brim 9 wide in the main hat 9 tall
